mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Profile ( profileCode, description, profileType, businessId, createdBy, lastModifiedBy, createdByIP, lastModifiedByIP, status, createDate, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{profileCode}, #{description}, #{profileType}, #{businessId}, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{createdByIP}, #{lastModifiedByIP}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Profile SET profileCode=#{profileCode}, description=#{description}, profileType=#{profileType}, businessId=#{businessId}, createdBy=#{createdBy}, lastModifiedBy=#{lastModifiedBy}, createdByIP=#{createdByIP}, lastModifiedByIP=#{lastModifiedByIP}, status=#{status}, createDate=#{createDate}, updateDate=#{updateDate} WHERE profileId=#{profileId}
